channel.title: Weird 562 glitch? when I try to pickup an item it moves me 1 space
channel.description: For some reason when i try to pickup items on my 562 server (gazaascape) it moves 1 space over after it picks it up, and sometimes it doesn't even pick it up. What is wrong!?

item.title: Weird 562 glitch? when I try to pickup an item it moves me 1 space
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Any item on the ground, player dropped or NPC dropped, both cause my player to move one space over when it’s picked up.

Read full topic
item.source: Weird 562 glitch? when I try to pickup an item it moves me 1 space
